text.div:
VhDir Consent Code System

Codes for use in defining access levels for sharing subsets of constrained content (as an example)

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/consent defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
protect ProtectThe data (or subset of data) provided should be only made available to the people, or types of people explicitly declared in the consent

name: VhDirConsent
title: VhDir Consent Code System
description: Codes for use in defining access levels for sharing subsets of constrained content (as an example)

concept.definition: The data (or subset of data) provided should be only made available to the people, or types of people explicitly declared in the consent
